actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the purchase of a certain statue of George Washington and for the placement of such statue on the East Front of the Capitol Building, or in any appropriate location inside such building.

summary.text: Directs the Joint Committee on the Library to purchase a specified statue of George Washington and arrange its placement in the Capitol. Requires the Secretary of the Air Force to provide the necessary transportation of such statue.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to provide for the purchase of a certain statue of George Washington and for the placement of such statue on the East Front of the Capitol Building, or in any appropriate location inside such building.
